com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.utils
Class CodexDate

java.lang.Object
  com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.utils.CodexDate

public class CodexDate
extends java.lang.Object

CodexDate is the public class to manage Date in Java CodeX applications. It allows you to get Date and Calendar java object from a unix time stamp

Constructor Summary
